mapper.select: select c.category_id as categoryId, c.name as categoryName, b.board_id as boardId, b.name as boardName from boards as b left join categories as c on b.category_id = c.category_id;

select p.post_id as postId, p.user_id as userId, p.user_type as userType, p.author, p.subject, p.views, p.created_at, pi.saved_file_name as savedFileName, pi.extension from posts as p left join users on p.user_id = pi.user_id where p.board = (select name from boards where board_id = #{board_id});
select b.name from posts as p left join boards as b on p.board_id = b.board_id where p.post_id = #{post_id};
